Item ID1303

The rune longsword is a longsword requiring 40 Attack to wield. It can be made using 2 runite bars at level 91 Smithing. It is the strongest longsword in free-to-play, surpassing the adamant longsword.

[[File:Rune longsword detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''rune longsword''' is a [[longsword]] requiring 40 [[Attack]] to wield. It can be made using 2 [[runite bar]]s at level 91 [[Smithing]]. It is the strongest longsword in [[free-to-play]], surpassing the [[adamant longsword]].
